Desc.eng: Van Helsing! So you are in command now?
Good question! Is the ship commanding the storm?
Well, I could cause an overload that would shut it down for good but... isn’t that thing beyond our defenses...?
Nah, a few enemy hordes along the way, the odd behemoth here and there. Trust me, it’ll be mind-numbingly boring.
Don’t worry. I’ll keep you alive.
Alright... I place my trust in you, hunter.
Don’t listen to her. Yes, and I have a task for you. There is an ornithopter launch tower nearby and it’s causing us plenty of grief. If I get you there, can you disable it?
